src:
The First 60 Minutes Of Need For Speed: Heat
06 Nov 2019, 09:00 by Paul Tamayo



I streamed Need For Speed: Heat on Kotaku’s Twitch channel earlier today and got to see the opening moments of the game. Check out the stream archive above and follow us on Twitch for more streams.
